entry.title: My first dreamforce experience
entry.content:
How it started

This year, my company where I work at, salesfive, gave me the possibility to attend dreamforce for the first time ever. This was the first real dreamforce after the two years of COVID-19 gloabl pandemic. It was an amazing experience and I am very lucky that I work in such a company where these opportunities are given.

In this post, I will post some pictures that I took during dreamforce.
